mapper.select: select * from (select /*+ INDEX_DESC(board_tbl pk_board) */ rownum rn, board_tbl.* from board_tbl where rownum <= (${page}*10)) where rn > (${page}-1)*10
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_tbl (bno, title, content, writer) VALUES (board_num.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.update: UPDATE board_tbl SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, writer = #{writer}, updatedate = SYSDATE WHERE bno = #{bno}
